name: data analysis notebooks
tagline: My mini-projects on web-scraping, data analysis and visualization.
body: ### Player Height in Women's College Basketball **Are players who are at least 6'5" more common in the major conferences or ranked teams?** 5.4% of players on ranked teams are at least 6'5". 2.8% of players in major conferences are at least 6'5". Overall, 1.5% of players are at least 6'5". See notebook. Implemented in Python, using ScraPy, BeautifulSoup, NumPy, Pandas and Matplotlib. ### Location of National Historic Landmarks **What major U.S. city is the farthest from any landmark?** Wichita, KS is 66.7 miles away from the closest landmark, "Spring Hill Ranch." **Which National Historic Landmark is the most isolated?** "Seal Island Historic District" is 254.6 miles from its closest neighbor, "Dutch Harbor Naval Operating Base and Fort Mears, U.S. Army." For more, see notebook. Implemented in Python, using ScraPy, BeautifulSoup, NumPy, Pandas and Pylab.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
